data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 336,141 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhangzhou, Fujian, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Zhangzhou, Fujian, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Zhangzhou, Fujian, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Zhangzhou, Fujian, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bunun people.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Zhangzhou prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 336,141 believers in the county of Zhangzhou the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.section_summary:
the county of Zhangzhou, Fujian, China has a population of 4,431,000.

We estimate Zhangzhou has 336,141 people who might know Jesus, 71,582 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,023,277 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Zhangzhou, Fujian, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
